name: r1fnon

stmt.origin: mpbir(wfn(cr1, con0), wfn(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), con0))

body.origin:
|- wfn(cr1, con0)
-| wfn(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), con0)
-| wb(wfn(cr1, con0), wfn(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), con0))
body.pretty:
⊢ R1[Fn]On
⊣ rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)[Fn]On
⊣ (R1[Fn]On ↔ rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)[Fn]On)

stmt.origin: fneq1i(cr1, con0, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wb(wfn(cr1, con0), wfn(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), con0))
-| wceq(cr1, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (R1[Fn]On ↔ rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)[Fn]On)
⊣ R1 = rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)

comment: The cumulative hierarchy of sets function is a function on the class of ordinal numbers. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)
